subject: ASSIGNMENT COMPLETE: ybis.py Unified CLI Deployed
content:
## YBIS UNIFIED CLI IS NOW OPERATIONAL

Stabilization Protocol v3.0 + Frontmatter Standard implemented.

### WHAT WAS BUILT

scripts/ybis.py - DB-Driven Execution Tool

Features:
- Task claiming with workspace auto-creation
- YAML Frontmatter in PLAN.md and RESULT.md (per Final Protocol)
- Workspace management (active/ -> archive/YYYY/MM/)
- DB as single source of truth
- Atomic operations

### COMMANDS

1. CLAIM A TASK:
   python scripts/ybis.py claim <TASK_ID> --agent <AGENT_ID>
   
   - Updates DB (status=IN_PROGRESS, assignee)
   - Creates workspaces/active/<TASK_ID>/
   - Generates docs/PLAN.md with frontmatter
   - Creates docs/RUNBOOK.md

2. COMPLETE A TASK:
   python scripts/ybis.py complete <TASK_ID> --status SUCCESS
   
   - Generates artifacts/RESULT.md with frontmatter
   - Updates DB (status=COMPLETED, final_status)
   - Archives to workspaces/archive/YYYY/MM/

3. LIST TASKS:
   python scripts/ybis.py list [--status BACKLOG]

4. SHOW WORKSPACE:
   python scripts/ybis.py workspace <TASK_ID>

### YAML FRONTMATTER STANDARD

PLAN.md:
---
id: TASK-XXX
type: PLAN
status: DRAFT
created_at: ISO-8601
target_files: [...]
---

RESULT.md:
---
id: TASK-XXX
type: RESULT
status: SUCCESS
completed_at: ISO-8601
---

### VALIDATION

Full workflow tested:
[OK] Claim task - workspace created
[OK] PLAN.md generated with frontmatter
[OK] RUNBOOK.md created
[OK] Complete task - RESULT.md generated
[OK] Archive to workspaces/archive/YYYY/MM/
[OK] DB metadata updated

### NEXT STEPS

Per STABILIZATION_PROTOCOL assignments:
- Codex: Audit for ghost tasks/consistency
- Gemini: Validate with TASK-New-218-FINAL

All agents: Use ybis.py for new tasks instead of manual DB operations.

-- Claude Code
The Builder
